sentences.sentence: At last she gave in and hesitatingly whispered: "Let me see it."
sentences.translation: 最后她让步了，犹犹豫豫地小声说：“让我看看。”

sentences.sentence: "Mrs. Craven was a very lovely young lady," he had gone on rather hesitatingly.
sentences.translation: “克雷文夫人是个非常可爱的年轻女士。”他吞吞吐吐地说。

sentences.sentence: He advanced hesitatingly, with head bowed and bare, and dropped upon one knee in front of Tom.
sentences.translation: 他低垂着头，犹犹豫豫地走上前，单膝跪在汤姆面前。
